title: Hour 2: Trouble in Tampa
description:
In this episode, Stephen A., Keyshawn Johnson, and Mina Kimes debate who is to blame for the Buccaneer's loss to the Steelers. Another NFL week in the books means another A-List from Stephen A., but do our guys agree with his top 5 teams? 2-time NBA champion Joe Dumars joins the show to talk about the Lakers' situation with Russell Westbrook and discuss which team has the toughest road to the finals. Chris "Mad Dog" Russo is here to tell us what has him mad this week in sports. Plus, Paul Finebaum joins the show to talk about his concern level for Alabama after losing to Tennessee.

itunes:author: ESPN, Stephen A. Smith, Molly Qerim Rose
itunes:subtitle: First Take Hour 2: Is Tom Brady to blame for the Bucs' loss to the Steelers?
